name: Reckless Brave
description:
A brave man’s soul was taken away by the succubus, so he decided to go into the dungeon to retrieve his soul.

However, as a reckless brave, he could only continue moving forward and attacking the enemies he saw without understanding the strategy of pass. The only thing waiting for him is the fate of death.

Now it’s your time to go!

Use your wisdom to place props in the path of the brave to keep it alive and let him retrieve is soul successfully!

7 different items to be placed, each one has multiple uses waiting to be discovered.

10 different levels to be challenged, each requires a different strategy.
